data.eml:eml: A new species of Pseudopaludicola (Anura, Leptodactylidae) from northern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giaretta, Ariovaldo A., De, Marcelo N., Kokubum, C. (2003): A new species of Pseudopaludicola (Anura, Leptodactylidae) from northern Brazil. Zootaxa 383: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156340
